changelog.change_log:
Update #1, version 0.1.7

The first update since the early access game release!

We thank you all for your comments and have made this update ASAP to improve the game based on your feedback.

Your feedback is very important to us. If you have any issues with the game or any ideas on how we can improve it, please write to us at info@dream-dev.com.

In this update:

- Added additional physical objects to the game levels with which you can interact and use to defeat enemies.
- Changed the angle for the Energy Blade (Katana) with the possibility to set up the angle manually in the game options.
- Changed the angle for firearms.
- Improved the grab system, which should resolve the issue where it was hard to pick up objects in some situations.
- Added game options to the Pause menu.
- Added the option to change the volume of the player's voiceover in the game menu.
- Music battle state is now stable and no longer interrupted randomly.
- Music mix has been enhanced.

In upcoming updates:

- We will add a new weapon: the shotgun.
- We will improve the inventory system with the ability to place any object in any slot.
- We are working on improving game graphics.
- We will add additional tasks to the game missions.
- We will add more variety to the level design.
- We are working on improving game stability.

Thank you for playing Death Horizon: Cyberfusion.

If you encounter any bugs or have any ideas on how to improve the game, please write to us at info@dream-dev.com.

Thank you!
